page.title: 17CHILDREN'S CLUBS,BIGGIN HILL
page.content: There are over 30 clubs in Biggin Hill for both boys and girls. There are some places which have activities such as brownies, girl guides, judo, boxing, scouts, disco, and many more. At most clubs you have to be a certain age to go. There are also clubs for Mums and Dads and some for over 60's. The school here has many activities. It is a good place for children to live because it is a lively place. Again at the school there are lots of music clubs. Some of them are at lunchtime and some are during the lessons. There is also the Spitfire Club which offers lots of activities but mostly for older children, except for Sunday School.
